Wisdom: الْإِحْسَانُ إِلَى الْمُسِي‏ءِ أَحْسَنُ الْفَضْلِ
enWisdom: Doing good to the one who offends you is the most excellent merit

Wisdom: الْإِحْسَانُ إِلَى الْمُسِي‏ءِ يَسْتَصْلِحُ الْعَدُوَّ
enWisdom: Doing good to the one who offends [you] reforms the enemy

Wisdom: أَحْسِنْ إِلَى الْمُسِي‏ءِ تَمْلِكْهُ
enWisdom: Be good to the evildoer and you will dominate him

Wisdom: أَحْسِنْ إِلَى مَنْ أَسَاءَ إِلَيْكَ وَاعْفُ عَمَّنْ جَنَى عَلَيْكَ
enWisdom: Do good to the one who does evil to you and forgive the one who wrongs you

Wisdom: إِنَّ مُقَابَلَةَ الْإِسَاءَةِ بِالْإِحْسَانِ وَتَغَمُّدَ الْجَرَائِمِ بِالْغُفْرَانِ لَمِنْ أَحْسَنِ الْفَضَائِلِ وَأَفْضَلِ الْمَحَامِدِ
enWisdom: Verily, confronting evil with good and the covering up wrongs with forgiveness are from the best virtues and the most praiseworthy qualities

Wisdom: إِنَّ مِنْ فَضْلِ الرَّجُلِ أَنْ يُنْصِفَ مِنْ نَفْسِهِ [مَنْ لَمْ يُنْصِفْهُ‏] وَيُحْسِنَ إِلَى مَنْ أَسَاءَ إِلَيْهِ
enWisdom: Indeed it is from the merit of a man to be fair with others, and to do good to the one who does him evil

Wisdom: إِنَّ مِنْ مَكَارِمِ الْأَخْلَاقِ أَنْ تَصِلَ مَنْ قَطَعَكَ وَتُعْطِيَ مَنْ حَرَمَكَ وَتَعْفُوَ عَمَّنْ ظَلَمَكَ
enWisdom: Verily it is from nobility of character to build ties with the one who cuts you off, to give one who deprives you and to forgive one who wrongs you

Wisdom: مَنْ أَحْسَنَ إِلَى مَنْ أَسَاءَ إِلَيْهِ فَقَدْ أَخَذَ بِجَوَامِعِ الْفَضْلِ
enWisdom: Whoever does good to the one who does evil to him has taken the all-encompassing excellence

Wisdom: مِنْ أَحْسَنِ الْكَرَمِ الْإِحْسَانُ إِلَى الْمُسِي‏ءِ
enWisdom: Doing good to the one who wrongs you is from the best [forms of] nobleness

Wisdom: لَا يَحُوزُ الْغُفْرَانَ إِلَّا مَنْ قَابَلَ الْإِسَاءَةَ بِالْإِحْسَانِ
enWisdom: No one gains forgiveness except he who reciprocates evil with good

Wisdom: الْمُحْسِنُ مَنْ عَمَّ النَّاسَ بِالْإِحْسَانِ
enWisdom: The good doer person is one who is benevolent to all people

Wisdom: إِكْمَالُ الْمَعْرُوفِ أَحْسَنُ مِنِ ابْتِدَائِهِ
enWisdom: Completing a good turn is better than starting it

Wisdom: إِتْبَاعُ الْإِحْسَانِ بِالْإِحْسَانِ مِنْ كَمَالِ الْجُودِ
enWisdom: Following up one favour with another favour is from the perfection of munificence

Wisdom: الْكَرِيمُ يَرَى مَكَارِمَ أَفْعَالِهِ دَيْناً عَلَيْهِ يَقْضِيهِ
enWisdom: A noble-minded person considers his virtuous actions as a debt that he has to repay

Wisdom: الْمَعْرُوفُ لَا يَتِمُّ إِلَّا بِثَلَاثٍ بِتَصْغِيرِهِ وَتَعْجِيلِهِ [وَ سَتْرِهِ‏] فَإِنَّكَ إِذَا صَغَّرْتَهُ فَقَدْ عَظَّمْتَهُ وَإِذَا عَجَّلْتَهُ فَقَدْ هَنَّأْتَهُ وَإِذَا سَتَرْتَهُ فَقَدْ تَمَّمْتَهُ
enWisdom: A benevolent action is not completed except by three things: by taking it to be insignificant, by expediting it and by concealing it; for when you take it to be insignificant, you have made it great; and when you expedite it, you have made it beneficial; and when you conceal it, you have made it complete

Wisdom: أَحْيِ مَعْرُوفَكَ بِإِمَاتَتِهِ
enWisdom: Give life to your good deed by killing it [ieby forgetting it]

Wisdom: أَحْسَنُ الْإِحْسَانِ مُوَاسَاةُ الْإِخْوَانِ
enWisdom: The greatest good deed is supporting one’s brothers [financially]

Wisdom: أَشْرَفُ الصَّنَائِعِ اصْطِنَاعُ الْكِرَامِ
enWisdom: The noblest of favours are the good turns of the munificent [and honourable] ones

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ النَّوَالِ مَا وَصَلَ قَبْلَ السُّؤَالِ
enWisdom: The best grant is that which is given before it is sought

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْفَضَائِلِ صِلَةُ الْهَاجِرِ [الْمُهَاجِرِ] وَإِينَاسُ النَّافِرِ وَالْأَخْذُ بِيَدِ الْعَاثِرِ
enWisdom: The best of virtues is establishing ties with the one who has distanced himself, being cordial with the one who is averse, and holding the hand of the one who stumbles

Wisdom: إِذَا صَنَعْتَ مَعْرُوفاً فَاسْتُرْهُ
enWisdom: When you perform a good turn then conceal it

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْبِرِّ مَا وَصَلَ إِلَى الْأَحْرَارِ
enWisdom: The best benefaction is that which reaches the free

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْبِرِّ مَا وَصَلَ إِلَى الْمُحْتَاجِ
enWisdom: The best righteous act is that which reaches the needy

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْكَرَمِ جُودٌ بِلَا طَلَبِ مُكَافَاةٍ
enWisdom: The best munificence is being generous without seeking [any] recompense

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْمَعْرُوفِ مَا أُصِيبَ بِهِ الْأَبْرَارُ
enWisdom: The best good turn is one that benefits the righteous

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْمَعْرُوفِ مَا لَمْ يَتَقَدَّمْهُ الْمَطَلُ وَلَمْ يَتْبَعْهُ الْمَنُّ
enWisdom: The best benevolent act is one that is neither preceded by delay nor followed by obligation

Wisdom: خَيْرُ النَّاسِ مَنْ كَانَ فِي عُسْرِهِ مُؤْثِراً صَبُوراً
enWisdom: The best person is one who is altruistic and patient in times of hardship

Wisdom: رَأْسُ الْإِحْسَانِ الْإِحْسَانُ إِلَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
enWisdom: The pinnacle of kindness is being kind to the believers

Wisdom: ظَفِرَ بِسَنِيِّ الْمَغَانِمِ وَاضِعُ صَنَائِعِهِ فِي الْأَكَارِمِ
enWisdom: The one who confers his favours to the honourable ones acquires the most sublime gains

Wisdom: مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْإِحْسَانِ الْإِحْسَانُ إِلَى الْأَبْرَارِ
enWisdom: One of the best favours is the favour that is done to the righteous
